definition:
Below is a list of main concepts in the part of ring theory concerning
ideals:

-   -   zero ideal

-   proper ideal

-   ideal of elements with finite order

-   modular ideal

-   regular ideal

-   nil ideal

-   nilpotent ideal

-   primitive ideal

-   primary ideal

-   semiprime ideal

-   prime ideal, minimal prime ideal

-   characterization of prime ideals

-   large ideal

-   maximal ideal

-   maximal ideal is prime

-   comaximal ideal

-   principal ideal

-   -   ideal generated by

-   sum of ideals

-   product of ideals

-   quotient of ideals

-   ideal multiplication laws

-   product of finitely generated ideals

-   ideal included in union of prime ideals

-   ideals contained in a union of ideals

-   dense ideals/subsets of a ring

-   cancellation ideal

-   radical ideal

-   fractional ideal of commutative ring

-   integral ideal

-   invertible ideal

-   invertibility of regularly generated ideal

-   inverse ideal

-   generators of inverse ideal

-   ideal generators in Prüfer ring

-   ideal inverting in Prüfer ring

-   fractional ideal (integral domain)

-   image ideal of divisor

-   ideals in a Dedekind domain
